snippet.title: Dash Dash World is OUT and Cross Platform [Gameplay Trailer]
snippet.description:
🎅🎄❄ Merry Christmas and Have fun driving!

Drive, Shoot & Drift like NEVER before. Dash Dash is a cross-platform VR kart racing game equipped with immersive full-hand driving and weapon controls. Lose yourself in hundreds of hours of gameplay. Including a fascinating story mode, exhilarating online tournaments, more than a trillion customization combinations, and hundreds of achievements for the trophy hunters out there! 

Key features 😍
Cross-platform play with Quest, Rift & Steam
Cross Buy for Rift & Quest
Race up to 8 friends
Offline Story mode
Over 100 hours of Gameplay, Quests & Achievements
All original & unique tracks
Cloud save
Regular online tournaments

Extras ✨
Motion sickness prevention options
Onboarding class for new VR racer
Game for everyone with Casual & Hardcore racing modes
Social with meme, stickers, voice chat & dance moves
Customize every detail from your outfit down to the rim of your car

Coming soon 🤩
More Maps
More Weapons
More online Tournaments


That opportunity is now yours. https://DashDashRacing.com 🏎

Oculus Store - https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/2159739540797724

SteamVR Store - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1159860/Dash_Dash_World

PSVR - Coming soon!

As always, there is a Redeem code hidden in our video ;)
